description:
Get ready for an exciting and competitive drone race in this drone racing game for Nintendo Switch™! Control your own drone and compete against other players in a series of speed races in stunning 3D environments.
Play alone or with friends to compete in an exciting drone race. With stunning 3D graphics and intuitive controls, this game is an exciting experience for all the racing and drone game lovers.

·Experience the thrill of flying your own drone in a game.
·Up to 5 players per turns in competition mode.
·Come up against your friends to determine who is the best drone pilot.
·Explore the secret level with a free mode and discover new areas in which to practice your skills and perform impressive stunts.
·Enjoy impressive graphics and intuitive controls that will allow you to feel the thrill of flying your own drone.
·Earn power cores and unlock an amazing secret level.
·Become the best drone pilot in this exciting game for the whole family.
·Effective controller, just like in real drones.
name: Drone Master Racing
